name: Nikki Bonsai Garden
description: The Nikki Bonsai Garden is a renowned bonsai garden located in Thuckalay, Nigeria. It is celebrated for its exquisite collection of bonsai trees meticulously cultivated and displayed in a serene and beautifully landscaped setting. The garden offers visitors a peaceful retreat amidst nature, where they can admire the artistry and craftsmanship involved in shaping and maintaining these miniature trees. Nikki Bonsai Garden serves as both an educational center and a place of relaxation, showcasing the beauty and cultural significance of bonsai artistry in Kanyakumari district.
location: 782F+FX3, Near Padmanabhapuram Palace, Chakala, Thuckalay, Tamil Nadu 629175
